section.name: GTOPO30 datasource
section.p: The gtopo30 module contains a datasource that can read the GTOPO30 format into a standard feature collection. Write support is needed. You can download the GTOPO30 DEM files and get more information about this file format at the GTOPO30 home site at http://edcdaac.usgs.gov/gtopo30/gtopo30.html
